name: Trend Explorer
description: Discover viral trends and content opportunities for your story
author: raymAIzing film

steps.prompt:
Analyze current viral trends and content opportunities:

Platform: {{platform}}
Category: {{category}}
Target Audience: {{targetAudience}}
Region: {{region}}
Timeframe: {{timeframe}}

Provide:

## 1. TOP 10 TRENDING TOPICS
List the top 10 trending topics/themes with viral potential. For each:
- Topic name
- Why it's trending
- Viral potential score (1-10)
- Story angle suggestion

## 2. EMERGING STORYTELLING FORMATS
- New formats gaining traction
- Why they work
- How to adapt for film

## 3. CONTENT GAP OPPORTUNITIES
- Underserved niches
- Audience demand vs supply
- Recommended approaches

## 4. HASHTAG RECOMMENDATIONS
- Top 20 relevant hashtags
- Engagement rates

## 5. BEST POSTING TIMES
- Optimal days and times
- Platform-specific recommendations

## 6. STORY IDEAS
Generate 5 story concepts based on these trends:
- Title
- Logline
- Why it would go viral
- Target platform
